map:
plugin_status ready
plugin_identifier org.lockss.plugin.internationalunionofcrystallography.oai.IUCrOaiPlugin
plugin_version 8
plugin_feature_version_map
Substance 3
Poll 3
Metadata 1
plugin_name International Union of Crystallography OAI Plugin
required_daemon_version 1.68.0
au_def_pause_time 3000
au_refetch_depth 1
http://scripts.iucr.org/cgi-bin/paper?S1600536805000310
au_name "International Union of Crystallography OAI Plugin, Base URL %s, Script URL %s, OAI Set %s, OAI Date %s", base_url, script_url, au_oai_set, au_oai_date
au_permission_url
"%slockss.html", script_url "%se/issues/2010/lockss.html", base_url
au_feature_urls
au_volume org.lockss.plugin.internationalunionofcrystallography.oai.IUCrOaiFeatureUrlHelperFactory
au_def_new_content_crawl 1209600000
au_crawlrules
1,"^https?://(%s|%s)/.*\.(bmp|css|eot|gif|ico|jpe?g|js|otf|png|svg|tif?f|ttf|woff)$", url_host(base_url), url_host(script_url) 1,"^%sauid=.*$", script_url 2,"^(%s|%s).*buy=yes$", script_url, base_url 1,"^(%s|%s)[^/]+/issues/[^/]+/[^/]+/[^/]+/[^/]+/(.+\.pdf|index\.html|.+fig[0-9]+\.html)$", base_url, script_url 1,"^(%s|%s)cgi-bin/paper\?[^/]+$", script_url, base_url 1,"^(%s|%s)cgi-bin/(sendsupfiles|sendsup|sendcif)\?.+$", script_url, base_url 1,"^http://publcif.iucr.org/cifmoldb/gui/cifjmol\.php\?cifid=[^/]+$"
au_substance_url_pattern
"^%s[^/]+/issues/[^/]+/[^/]+/[^/]+/[^/]+/.+\.pdf$", base_url
au_permitted_host_pattern publcif\.iucr\.org
plugin_config_props
base_url Base URL Usually of the form http://<journal-name>.com/ 3 40 true false
script_url Script URL Usually of the form http://<journal-name>.com/ 3 40 true false
au_oai_set OAI Set OAI PMH set of this AU. [NONE] if you would like to include all sets 1 20 true false
au_oai_date OAI Date Rules to filter records based upon metadata 1 128 true false
plugin_crawl_seed_factory org.lockss.plugin.internationalunionofcrystallography.oai.IUCrOaiCrawlSeedFactory
plugin_access_url_factory org.lockss.plugin.internationalunionofcrystallography.oai.IUCrOaiFeatureUrlHelperFactory
text/html_filter_factory org.lockss.plugin.internationalunionofcrystallography.oai.IUCrOaiHtmlHashFilterFactory
text/html_crawl_filter_factory org.lockss.plugin.internationalunionofcrystallography.oai.IUCrOaiHtmlCrawlFilterFactory
plugin_article_iterator_factory org.lockss.plugin.internationalunionofcrystallography.oai.IUCrOaiArticleIteratorFactory
plugin_article_metadata_extractor_factory org.lockss.plugin.internationalunionofcrystallography.oai.IUCrOaiArticleIteratorFactory
text/html_metadata_extractor_factory_map
*;DublinCore org.lockss.plugin.internationalunionofcrystallography.oai.IUCrOaiHtmlMetadataExtractorFactory
